INITIAL_DELAY: Initial delay set. Starting in {seconds} second(s).
UPDATE_SCHEDULED: Update scheduled to run automatically every {seconds} second(s).
DATA_FAILURE_RETRY: Error retrieving data from the Plex server, trying again in {retryTimeInSeconds} seconds.
DATA_REQUESTED: Request sent to get the data form the Plex server.
DATA_SUCCESS: Data received from the Plex server after {numberOfAttempts} attempt(s).
DATA_FAILURE: Error retrieving data from the Plex server.
